title: Coming back to league almost 2 months later
body:
Rank drop to Gold from plat #sad
Cannot play properly due to other games hands are more faster in keyboard than mouse #feelslikebronze

Actually playing really bad idk what to do from here onward #sometimesijustlostmyselfingame and later i realise i am under enemy turret :< 


Ps: should i keep playing or just quit this game  not sure :/
